pages.text: These razor sharp arrows are able to be shot underwater and are able to pierce translucent blocks like $(item)Glass$() while dealing increased damage.$(br)Each one also has a secondary effect, depending on what you tip them with.
Pulls the target in your direction, ready to be dealt a deadly melee hit.
Freezes the target, slowing them down. Also deals freezing damage over time.
Hits your foe with enormous force, knocking them far away.
Deals damage regardless of the target's invincibility frames and resets them. Deals additional damage to armor and shields.
Explodes in an orb of pure energy, dealing damage to creatures close by.
